    What is the standard equation of a circle?

    This is the general standard equation for the circle centered at (h,k) with radius r.

    Example

    Using the standard equation of circles

    What is the center of the circle? (-4, 6)

    What is its radius?

    Writing circle equations

    A circle has a radius of $ \sqrt13 $ units and is centered at (-9.3,4.1) Write the equation of this circle. $ (x+9.3)^2 + (y-4.1)^2 = 13 $
